articles.title: Tour veteran Kanepi stuns second seed Sabalenka, Cornet makes quarters at her 17th attempt - The Age
articles.description: Kaia Kanepi rallied to topple world No.2 and second seed Aryna Sabalenka. Earlier, Alize Cornet dropped to her knees in tears after beating former world No.1 Simona Halep.
articles.content:
Gerulaitis famously said, no one beats Vitas Gerulaitis 17 times in a row after beating Jimmy Connors for the first time at their 17th meeting.
